name: Boyfriend Badges: series 2 Advanced Achievements
description:
Series 2 of Boyfriend Badges! Collect them all for the maximum bonding experience!

This set includes (from top left to bottom right): Road Trip Survival, Close Encounters with the Ungroomed Kind, Forget and Forgive, Conquista-Drawer, Key Swap, and Open Door Policy.
Each Badge is 1.25 inches.

name: Girlfriend Badges
description:
By popular demand, some girl-centric achievement badges to bestow upon your kick ass girlfriend, friend, or self (hey, you earned 'em)! 

The set includes (from top left to bottom right): Bro Approved, Menstrual Management, "It's Ok" (Erectile Dysfunction Amnesty Badge), Boobs-Yay!, Fast Food Friendly, and Video Game Tolerance.

Buttons are 1.25 inches

name: Boyfriend Badges: series 1
description:
The original set that made a splash on sites like Geekologie, dating fails, and Plastic and Plush.
This set of 6 includes (from top left to bottom right): Drunk Make Outs, You've Accepted My Fetish, Breaking the Fart Barrier, My Pet Likes You, Met the Parents, and Moral Support While Puking.
